title: Water Powered Brush
description: The Water Powered Brush uses high-pressure water jets to dislodge dirt and grime without damaging surfaces. Its soft-bristle head is perfect for sensitive materials like solar panels and car exteriors. This tool is easy to connect to any standard garden hose, making it a must-have for eco-conscious cleaners.

title: Installation Tool
description: The Installation Tool is a compact, ergonomic device designed to make solar panel mounting a breeze. With a non-slip grip and magnetic interchangeable heads, it's the perfect companion for any solar technician or DIY enthusiast tackling their own green energy projects.

title: Solar Powered Brush
description: The Solar Powered Brush is a self-sustaining cleaning tool designed specifically for solar panels. Powered by sunlight, it automatically rotates and scrubs away dust and debris. Reduce maintenance costs and maximize solar output with this autonomous cleaner.
specifications: Power: Solar panel with battery backup

title: Cleaning Kit
description: An all-in-one Cleaning Kit featuring multiple brushes, microfiber cloths, and eco-safe cleaning fluid. Designed for maximum compatibility with glass, panels, and plastics, it ensures a streak-free, scratch-resistant clean every time.
specifications: Kit Includes: 3 brushes, 2 cloths, 1 spray bottle

title: Suction Cup
description: Heavy-duty Suction Cup designed for safely lifting and positioning glass panels and other flat surfaces. Industrial strength grip with quick-release functionality for efficiency and safety during installs.
specifications: Material: Industrial silicone and ABS plastic

title: Solar Tool Roller
description: The Solar Tool Roller simplifies the transportation of heavy solar panels across roofs and work areas. With rugged wheels and a low-friction bed, it's engineered to reduce strain and speed up installations.
idealFor: Moving solar panels during large installs

title: Solar Power Meter
description: The Solar Power Meter is a compact device designed to measure solar irradiance and output performance. Featuring a built-in solar sensor and an easy-to-read digital display, this meter is perfect for both field and lab use. It helps users monitor solar panel efficiency, identify shading issues, and optimize panel placement.

title: Diagnostic Clamp Meter
description: This specialized Clamp Meter is designed for troubleshooting and maintaining solar panel systems. It safely measures current without breaking the circuit, and supports both AC and DC voltage. Its lightweight and ergonomic design makes it ideal for use in tight or elevated locations.
idealFor: Electricians working with renewable energy systems

title: Infrared Thermometer
description: The Infrared Thermometer quickly detects surface temperatures from a distance, ideal for identifying hot spots on solar panels. With a laser targeting system and a wide temperature range, it ensures accurate readings without direct contact. This tool helps prevent performance loss due to overheating cells.

title: Handheld Cleaning Tool
description: This ergonomic handheld tool is designed for cleaning dirt and debris from solar panels safely and efficiently. With a manual rotary brush and a built-in water spray nozzle, it ensures panels stay clean for maximum energy output. No power needed — it's entirely manual, making it perfect for off-grid use.
specifications: Water Source: Connects to standard garden hose
idealFor: Solar farm technicians performing regular cleaning
Eco-conscious users preferring manual, non-electric tools

title: Solar Lamp
description: Illuminate your garden or walkway with this elegant solar lamp. Powered entirely by sunlight, it charges during the day and automatically lights up at night. The waterproof design and stainless steel body make it perfect for outdoor use year-round.
specifications: Material: Stainless steel and ABS plastic

title: Digital Multimeter
description: Specifically calibrated for solar applications, this digital multimeter measures voltage, current, and resistance with high accuracy. Equipped with a large backlit display and auto-ranging capabilities, it's ideal for diagnosing and maintaining solar PV systems in the field or at home.
specifications: Safety Rating: CAT III 1000V / CAT IV 600V
idealFor: DIY users troubleshooting home solar systems
Electricians ensuring safe and optimal solar operation
